channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：安娜和安吉是数以千计的哥伦比亚妇女中的一员，她们为了摆脱贫困，不惜贩卖毒品，最终身陷囹圄。
item.description:
VIDEO: Ana and Angie are among thousands of Colombian women who have found themselves behind bars after resorting to drug trafficking to escape poverty. pic.twitter.com/m9WFJR1wLF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 菲利普-拉姆（Philipp Lahm）周二支持拜耳勒沃库森主教练哈维-阿隆索（Xabi Alonso）就自己的未来做出正确的决定，并称他的前拜仁慕尼黑队友为 "战略家"。
item.description:
Philipp Lahm backed Bayer Leverkusen coach Xabi Alonso on Tuesday to make the right decision on his future, calling his former Bayern Munich teammate "a strategist".#AFPSports https://t.co/ItlhgHgQ0q

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：动物爱好者齐聚上海，观看宠物时装秀，四条腿的模特身着迷你服装亮相。
item.description:
VIDEO: Animal lovers gather in Shanghai to watch a pet fashion show featuring four-legged models in miniature garments. pic.twitter.com/dy4UHZCr10

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 法国农村和小镇的市长们对移民从首都转移到他们的社区越来越愤怒，他们认为这与巴黎奥运会前的清洁工作有关。
item.description:
Mayors in rural and small-town France are increasingly angry over the transfer of migrants from the capital to their communities, which they believe is linked to clean-up efforts ahead of the Paris Olympics.https://t.co/oK6Hu3TvLZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: #欧盟要求大型科技公司在集团选举前识别人工智能深度伪造数据
item.description:
#BREAKING EU tells big tech to identify AI deepfakes ahead of bloc's elections pic.twitter.com/23L8HDWvjY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：伦敦在伦敦举办奥运会十多年后的今天，位于斯特拉特福德的奥林匹克公园内和周围的建筑起重机仍然无处不在，那里仍有大量建筑在施工中。
item.description:
VIDEO: More than a decade after London hosted the Olympic Games, construction cranes are still omnipresent in and around the Olympic Park in Stratford, where an array of buildings remain under construction. pic.twitter.com/9afw849dum

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 官方数据周二显示，法国2023年的预算赤字将超过预期，这有损于埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统在未来四年内使国家财政重回正轨的承诺。
item.description:
France's budget deficit overshot forecasts in 2023, official figures showed Tuesday, undermining President Emmanuel Macron's pledge to bring national finances back on track within the next four years.https://t.co/ctObtbmBiL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 肯尼亚当局周二开始公布一个末日饥饿邪教受害者的遗体，这起震惊世界的惨绝人寰的乱葬坑事件被发现已近一年。
item.description:
Kenyan authorities on Tuesday began releasing the bodies of victims of a doomsday starvation cult, almost a year since the discovery of mass graves in a grisly case that shocked the world.https://t.co/H5bhCtRyni

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：佐佐木康（Yasushi Sasaki）19 岁时从日本来到比利时，当时他对自己的生活毫无头绪。现在，52 岁的他被法国著名美食指南《Gault&Millau》评为 2024 年布鲁塞尔最佳巧克力师。
item.description:
VIDEO: Yasushi Sasaki moved from Japan to Belgium at the age of 19, with no clue what he would do with his life. Now, the 52-year-old has been named the best chocolatier in Brussels for 2024 by the prestigious French gastronomic guide Gault&Millau. pic.twitter.com/muw4QeNqEW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 朝鲜领导人金正恩权势熏天的妹妹周二表示，平壤将拒绝与日本进行 "任何接触或谈判"，而就在此前一天，她还表示东京首相岸田文雄已请求与她的哥哥举行峰会。
item.description:
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un's powerful sister said Tuesday Pyongyang would reject "any contact or negotiations" with Japan, just a day after she said Tokyo's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida had requested a summit with her brother.https://t.co/8bdNLZdCeg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 一名土耳其安全官员周二表示，莫斯科音乐厅袭击案的两名嫌疑人 "自由 "前往俄罗斯，因为没有对他们发出逮捕令。
item.description:
A Turkish security official on Tuesday said two of the Moscow concert hall attack suspects travelled "freely" to Russia as no arrest warrants were issued against them.https://t.co/PqDAgCZgpo

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：工业渔船气势汹汹地盘旋在厄瓜多尔加拉帕戈斯海洋保护区的边缘，五颜六色的鱼群和双髻鲨在受保护的太平洋水域嬉戏。
item.description:
VIDEO: Industrial fishing boats hover menacingly on the edges of Ecuador's Galapagos Marine Reserve, where schools of multicolored fish and hammerhead sharks frolic in the protected Pacific waters. pic.twitter.com/8Hf0Ovmkaj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：印度和尼泊尔的狂欢者相互涂抹色彩和水，庆祝印度教的春季色彩节。
item.description:
VIDEO: Revellers across India and Nepal smear each other with colours and water to celebrate the Hindu spring festival of colours. pic.twitter.com/QCWvLgRaeH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 土耳其内政部长：在全国范围的突袭行动中拘留了 147 名 IS 嫌疑人
item.description:
#BREAKING Turkey detains 147 IS suspects in nationwide raids: interior minister pic.twitter.com/tp5jWazHOR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 16 年前在印度奥迪沙邦发生的针对基督徒的残暴袭击事件的幸存者仍然担心他们这个少数民族在印度教占多数的国家中的地位。
item.description:
Christians in India fearful as election looms.

Survivors of brutal attacks on Christians 16 years ago in Odisha state still worry about their minority's place in a Hindu-majority nationhttps://t.co/e57jVSKjtA pic.twitter.com/v7K4d6kmKT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在穆斯林神圣的斋月期间，@AFP 的 Khaled Desouki 拍摄了埃及穆斯林在开罗马塔里亚郊区的 Ezbet Hamada 举行的集体 "开斋饭"。
item.description:
Mass meal.@AFP's Khaled Desouki photographs Egyptian Muslims gathering in streets lined with long tables to break their fast together in a mass "iftar" meal in Ezbet Hamada in Cairo's Matariya suburb, during the Muslim holy fasting month of Ramadan pic.twitter.com/E0JLPtVHDC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚小型超市高管因印有 "真主 "字样的袜子而受到指控。此案引起了国王罕见的斥责，他要求进行调查，并对任何被认定犯有伤害宗教感情罪的当事人采取 "严厉行动
item.description:
Malaysia mini-mart executives charged over socks emblazoned with the word "Allah".

The case has drawn a rare royal rebuke from the king who has called for an investigation and "strict action" against any party found guilty of hurting religious feelingshttps://t.co/n1GPs1OHbq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: #哈马斯领导人哈尼亚访问德黑兰：伊朗国家媒体
item.description:
#BREAKING Hamas leader Haniyeh visits Tehran: Iran state media pic.twitter.com/G4a0mvX88l

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国快餐业巨头麦当劳因被指控卫生条件差而与当地特许经营权持有人展开了一场法律战，此后，斯里兰卡各地的麦当劳门店于周末关闭。
item.description:
McDonald's stores across Sri Lanka shut at the weekend after the US fast-food giant launched a legal battle with its local franchise holder over allegations of poor hygiene.

The Commercial High Court of Colombo ordered the closures until April 4, after the parent company accused… pic.twitter.com/DrKTHlRLTm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据国家媒体报道，前中国足协主席因收受价值 1100 万美元的贿赂被判终身监禁
item.description:
Former China football chief has been sentenced to life in prison for accepting bribes worth $11 million, state media reportshttps://t.co/tmUMdhNa4j pic.twitter.com/H7mCjBRNEm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国农民周一将拖拉机开到伦敦市中心的英国议会外，抗议英国脱欧后的贸易协议，他们认为这些协议威胁到了粮食生产
item.description:
British farmers drove their tractors outside the UK parliament in central London on Monday to protest post-Brexit trade deals, which they say threaten food productionhttps://t.co/MV08QLSoqG pic.twitter.com/l48qo7YDvd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: #委内瑞拉反对党人士、西北部苏利亚州州长曼努埃尔-罗萨莱斯（Manuel Rosales）已正式登记参加 7 月 28 日的总统选举。
item.description:
#BREAKING Venezuelan opposition figure and governor of the northwest Zulia state Manuel Rosales has officially registered for the July 28 presidential election, the National Electoral Council announced early Tuesday pic.twitter.com/HXWmodnW3e

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 视频： 达尔文的加拉帕戈斯岛屿物种，受保护但仍处于危险之中工业渔船气势汹汹地盘旋在厄瓜多尔加拉帕戈斯海洋保护区的边缘，五颜六色的鱼群和双髻鲨在受保护的太平洋水域中嬉戏。该保护区...
item.description:
VIDEO: Darwin's Galapagos island species, protected yet still at risk

Industrial fishing boats hover menacingly on the edges of Ecuador's Galapagos Marine Reserve, where schools of multicolored fish and hammerhead sharks frolic in the protected Pacific waters. The reserve is… pic.twitter.com/HMkXRQQDUS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 风味奇才："日本巧克力师征服比利时......佐佐木康 19 岁从日本移居比利时时，一句法语也不会说，也不知道自己这辈子会做什么。上个月，52 岁的他被评为布鲁塞尔年度巧克力大师。
item.description:
'Flavour wizard:' Japanese chocolatier conquers Belgium.

When Yasushi Sasaki moved from Japan to Belgium at the age of 19, he spoke not a word of French and had no clue what he would do with his life. Last month, at the age of 52, he was named Brussels' chocolatier of the year… pic.twitter.com/ryCFdPyu3I

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：以色列国防部长约阿夫-加兰特（Yoav Gallant）在华盛顿表示，在武装分子释放人质之前，以色列不会结束对哈马斯的战争，此前以色列因联合国安理会呼吁停火而取消了另一个前往美国的代表团。
item.description:
VIDEO: Israel will not end its war against Hamas until militants free hostages, Defense Minister Yoav Gallant says in Washington after Israel cancelled another US-bound delegation over a UN Security Council ceasefire call pic.twitter.com/ulSM2loT0K

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: #世界排名第一的斯维特克被亚历山德罗娃淘汰出迈阿密公开赛
item.description:
#BREAKING World No.1 Swiatek knocked out of Miami Open by Alexandrova pic.twitter.com/yjpECzctUW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 卡洛斯-奥乔亚（Carlos Ochoa）说："这是一次独特的经历。
item.description:
Devils whip sinners in El Salvador Holy Week tradition.

"It's been a unique experience," says Carlos Ochoa, who traveled almost 100 kilometers (62 miles) for the whippinghttps://t.co/3OqYsQl60A pic.twitter.com/EjDTlvbzvS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴西前总统博尔索纳罗在匈牙利使馆逗留数日后否认自己是在寻求避难，此前警方没收了他的护照并逮捕了两名助手，作为所谓 "未遂政变 "调查的一部分
item.description:
Brazilian ex-president Bolsonaro denies he was seeking refuge when he stayed at Hungarian embassy just days after police confiscated his passport and arrested two aides as part of alleged "coup attempt" probehttps://t.co/OhijwadYOn pic.twitter.com/bkGVpcGnr1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: #根据新宪法，总统将由立法者而非人民选举产生，这为福雷-纳辛贝总统无限期掌权铺平了道路。
item.description:
#BREAKING Togolese lawmakers adopt new constitution less than a month before the next election.

According to the new text, the president will be chosen by lawmakers rather than elected by the people, paving the way for president Faure Gnassingbe to remain in power indefinitely pic.twitter.com/edMrMuCQcZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴西体育法庭称，弗拉门戈队的巴西前锋加布里埃尔-巴尔博萨（Gabriel Barbosa，人称加比戈尔）因在兴奋剂检测中企图欺诈而被禁赛两年。
item.description:
Flamengo's Brazil forward Gabriel Barbosa, known as Gabigol, has been suspended for two years for attempted fraud during a doping test, a Brazilian sports court said.https://t.co/vUQCXJIoES pic.twitter.com/P8G6ZJXJMd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024
